techmeme.title: A US judge dismisses a 2022 lawsuit accusing Google of misdirecting the RNC's emails to Gmail's spam folder, saying the party had not made an adequate case (Mike Scarcella/Reuters)
Google unveils AI features for Chrome on desktop, including support for Google Lens and searching history via natural language queries, rolling out in the US (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
UAE-based G42 is working with the US and Emirati government "to comply with the highest global standards" in AI, after US lawmakers questioned its China ties (Reuters)
Protect AI, which develops software to help enterprises secure AI models and applications, raised $60M led by Evolution Equity Partners at a $400M valuation (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
Google Cloud expands its database portfolio with new AI capabilities, including updates to its Spanner SQL database, which now supports graph and vector search (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
